Abilities.Name: Basic Attack
Abilities.Description: The Hero slashes the enemy with his sword.

Abilities.Name: Ranged Attack
Abilities.Description: The Hero shoots the enemy with his bow.

Abilities.Name: Power Shot
Abilities.Description: The Hero uses a great amount of strength to draw the bow, unleashing a powerful arrow.

Effects.Name: Power Shot Mastery
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds .15 to the Strength Factor of this ability

Effects.Name: Draw Power
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds 5 to the Stamina Cost of this ability

Effects.Name: Draw Power
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds .25 to the Range of this ability

Abilities.Name: Light Footed
Abilities.Description: The Hero's agility allows him to move more often.

Effects.Name: Agile
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability decreases his initiative by 15 percent

Abilities.Name: Born Leader
Abilities.Description: The Hero's charisma allows him to command more troops.

Effects.Name: Charisma
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases the Party Size by 1

Abilities.Name: Athletic
Abilities.Description: The Hero's intense training allows him to recover stamina faster.

Effects.Name: Marathon Man
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases his stamina regen by 25%

Abilities.Name: Flame Strike
Abilities.Description: The Hero imbues his sword with fiery magic and strikes his enemy.

Effects.Name: Blazing It Up
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases the Magic Factor of this ability by .25

Effects.Name: Need More Fuel
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases the MP cost of this ability by 1

Abilities.Name: Power Strike
Abilities.Description: The Hero raises his sword above his head and swings it down with tremendous force.

Effects.Name: Power Strike Mastery
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds .2 to the Strength Factor of this ability

Effects.Name: Heavy Lifting
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds 5 to the Stamina Cost of this ability
